title: For gentlemen only
creator_credit: Michael Scott, Roman Kroitor, Vladmir Valenta and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The story of two retired old men whose comfortable world is threatened when their hotel, formerly for gentlemen only, decides to admit women. The film shows how they react to and cope with this change. (Award: Toronto)
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Scott, Roman Kroitor, Vladmir Valenta and National Film Board of Canada
